revision.text:
Please do not delete this article to your community :Nobody proposed deletion. [[User:Kleuske|Kleuske]] ([[User talk:Kleuske|talk]]) 12:44, 19 August 2017 (UTC) Please say to Jungledyret Hugo complaint this article this but do not delete send to Kleuske Now.... — Preceding [[Wikipedia:Signatures|unsigned]] comment added by [[User:Ejbaluyot|Ejbaluyot]] ([[User talk:Ejbaluyot#top|talk]] • [[Special:Contributions/Ejbaluyot|contribs]]) 12:50, 19 August 2017 (UTC) Can you added an Dutch-Based Announcers? — Preceding [[Wikipedia:Signatures|unsigned]] comment added by [[User:Ejbaluyot|Ejbaluyot]] ([[User talk:Ejbaluyot#top|talk]] • [[Special:Contributions/Ejbaluyot|contribs]]) 01:11, 20 August 2017 (UTC) : Please stop adding these strange sentences, they don't make any sense. Also information on [[BNN]] and [[VARA]] specifically is not needed as they already have their own articles. The announcers section was recently rewritten on the Dutch page, I can add it based on that. [[Special:Contributions/37.228.245.132|37.228.245.132]] ([[User talk:37.228.245.132|talk]]) 13:49, 22 August 2017 (UTC) This article is very hard to understand and a lot of sentences don't make sense. I cleaned up the infobox and introduction but it needs more work [[Special:Contributions/37.228.245.132|37.228.245.132]] ([[User talk:37.228.245.132|talk]]) 17:02, 20 August 2017 (UTC) :I cleaned up the article some more and removed all poorly written sentences. It could use some more information added but for now it's fine [[Special:Contributions/37.228.245.132|37.228.245.132]] ([[User talk:37.228.245.132|talk]]) 17:42, 20 August 2017 (UTC) ::Not really. What, for example, does '''this''' mean » ''BNNVARA will start to show programs though VARA and for radio'' « :? -- [[User:Picapica|Picapica]] ([[User talk:Picapica|talk]]) 22:44, 12 June 2019 (UTC) == You say I'll added == Need Added to update this article * Leonie Sazias (Politician from [[50PLUS]]) * Astrid Joosten * Joop Smits (Deceased) * Elles Berger (Son of Joop Smits) * Merel Holl * Marceline Schopman (Politician from [[Labour Party (Netherlands)|PvdA]] — Preceding [[Wikipedia:Signatures|unsigned]] comment added by [[User:Ejbaluyot|Ejbaluyot]] ([[User talk:Ejbaluyot#top|talk]] • [[Special:Contributions/Ejbaluyot|contribs]]) 04:42, 8 September 2017 (UTC) == So what is it? == It's an "association?" That's almost meaningless.
Like some kids in Mom's basement with a computer?
Like a television station? A network like [[CBS]] or ABC? Public broadcaster like [[NPR]] or [[PBS]]? Like [[Pacifica Foundation]] or [[KPFA]] non-commercial radio? What is its coverage? Its budget? Earnings? etc etc.... What is it? —Cheers!
--[[Special:Contributions/2602:306:CFCE:1EE0:3044:A2C3:2683:987B|2602:306:CFCE:1EE0:3044:A2C3:2683:987B]] ([[User talk:2602:306:CFCE:1EE0:3044:A2C3:2683:987B|talk]]) 00:02, 8 December 2018 (UTC)Doug Bashford :OK, I cleaned up the lede section by removing the duplicate history. But needs work. Suggest also: [[Wikipedia:Manual of Style (lead section)]] Cheers!
--[[Special:Contributions/2602:306:CFCE:1EE0:3044:A2C3:2683:987B|2602:306:CFCE:1EE0:3044:A2C3:2683:987B]] ([[User talk:2602:306:CFCE:1EE0:3044:A2C3:2683:987B|talk]]) 00:40, 8 December 2018 (UTC)Doug Bashford
